content: repeat from * for 5 petals slip_stitch into first st fo weave in ends use stem color to sew bouquet together and to sew onto hand of f m for stitchbeard - start with red work rounds 1-4 then add an additional 2 rounds of red switch to face color on last st of red then do rounds 5-13 in face color switch to a variegated or shirt color of choice on last st of r13 work rounds 14-33 in shirt color switching to black or other dark color on last st of round 33 work rounds 34-35 and legs in dark color hands are same color as face arms are same as shirt *bandana ties - 1 chain 7 turn slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 3 chain 3 slip_stitch into same st as last double_crochet chain 10 turn slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 3 chain 3 slip_stitch back into same as last double_crochet there should be a small chain between the two shapes fo leave tail for sewing fold in half using small tail chain to sew the pice to the side of the head near where you switched from red to face color *eye patch - black leave 3-4 tail at beg & end 1 chain 7 turn single_crochet 6 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet 6 3 chain 1 turn decrease single_crochet 4 5 4 chain 1 turn decrease single_crochet 3 4 5 slip_stitch up the side fo leave end tail - use tails to tie eye patch around head over one eye
